channel.title: Commands&server lag problem and other stuff
channel.description:
ok i just made my first server called rockindragonscape i used deom scape as its source.now idk how to make npc talk,make commands,idk how to get the training in dummy room to work,and idk how to ban people.i put their name in ban list then i save but it dosnt do anything.please help me i really need some help.and my server is laggin with only 10 people on it!!!!
who ever helpes me will be a legend on rockindragonscape :-/

item.title: Commands&server lag problem and other stuff
item.dc:creator: @dragon991877 dragon991877
item.description:
@dragon991877 wrote:

search npc handler like he said…dude…listen ur not oging to get anytihng better…then look for the npc…uwana change the dialouge or watever…and make the message plain & simple

Read full topic
